title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers:
Leigh Brackett, 
Lawrence Kasdan,
George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
writers:
Lana Wachowski,
Lilly Wachowski
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
writers: George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
writers:
Robet Zemeckis,
Bob Gale
actors:
Michael J. Fox,
Christopher Lloyd,
Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
writers:
Dan O'Bannon,
Ronald Shusett
actors:
Sigourney Weaver,
Tom Skerritt,
John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
writers:
Lawrence Kasdan, 
George Lucas, 
Philip Kaufman
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Karen Allen,
Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers:
Hampton Fancher, 
David Webb Peoples, 
Philip K. Dick
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Rutger Hauer, 
Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
writers: William Goldman
actors:
Cary Elwes,
Mandy Patinkin,
Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers:
Gene Roddenberry,
Jack B. Sowards,
Harve Bennett
actors:
William Shatner,
Leonard Nimoy,
DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Flubber
writers: Samuel W. Taylor, John Hughes, Bill Walsh
actors: Robin Williams, Marcia Gay Harden, Christopher McDonald
shortDescription: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: Up
writers: Pete Docter, Bob Peterson, Tom McCarthy
actors: Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger
shortDescription: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: Gone in 60 Seconds
writers: H.B. Halicki, Scott Rosenberg
actors: Nicolas Cage, Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi
shortDescription: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
writers: Chris Morgan
actors: Lucas Black, Zachery Ty Bryan, Shad Moss
shortDescription: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

title: Get Out
studio: Blumhouse Productions, QC Entertainment, Monkeypaw Productions
writers: Jordan Peele
actors: Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford
shortDescription: A young African-American visits his White girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
studio: Touchstone Pictures, Mad Chance, Jaret Entertainment
writers: Karen McCullah, Kirsten Smith, William Shakespeare
actors: Heath Ledger, Julia Stiles, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
shortDescription: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.

title: Casino Royale
writers: Neal Purvis, Robert Wade, Paul Haggis
actors: Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Judi Dench
shortDescription: After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.

title: Logan
studio: 20th Century Fox, Marvel Entertainment, Kinberg Genre
writers: James Mangold, Scott Frank, Michael Green
actors: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen
shortDescription: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: Ford v Ferrari
studio: Chernin Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Turnpike Films
writers: Jez Butterworth, John-Henry Butterworth, Jason Keller
actors: Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal
shortDescription: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Transporter 3
studio: EuropaCorp, TF1 Films Production, Grive Productions, Apipoulaï Prod., Current Entertainment, Canal+, CinéCinéma
writers: Luc Besson, Robert Mark Kamen
actors: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova
shortDescription: Frank Martin is forced to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery.
